metadata.title: CVE-2021-38714 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Plib through 1.85, there is an integer overflow vulnerability that could result in arbitrary code execution. The vulnerability is found in ssgLoadTGA() function in src/ssg/ssgLoadTGA.cxx file.

criterions.comment: plib package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
